Package org.apache.heron.common.testhelpers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HeronServerTester.TestRequestHandler
    Interface to provide the Message to be sent upon onConnect and the expected Message.Builder to be used for the response.
    HeronServerTester.TestResponseHandler
    Interface to handle a response received by the server.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommunicatorTestHelper
    Communicator test helper can spy on a communicator to provide the ability to await a certain number of expected offers to be received before proceeding.
    HeronServerTester
    Class to help simplify testing HeronServer implementations by consolidating common test functionality.
    HeronServerTester.AbstractTestClient
    Abstract class to simplify writing test clients by providing default method impls.
    HeronServerTester.SuccessResponseHandler
    Generic SuccessResponseHandler that asserts that the response status code is OK and that the message is of the expected type.
